class_notes:
(Letter Grade Only)


(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)
course_description: The goal is to expose students to current research in different topics and/or disciplines, thus allowing them to make a more informed decision about which area of emphasis in the Program they wish to pursue and to assist the student in deciding on a mentor by providing an opportunity to sample the research environment, assess the available research projects, and determine if the mentor will be suitable as a PhD dissertation advisor.
sections: Class Nbr: 1327, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: C. Moe, Status: Open
